hadiths.text: Anas b. Malik reported that Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) died when he was sixty-three years old, and so was the case with Abu Bakr, and so was the case with Umar who was also sixty-three (when he died)

chapter.ara-name: باب كَمْ سِنُّ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم يَوْمَ قُبِضَ .
chapter.eng-name: The Age Of The Prophet (ﷺ) When He Died
